apple_vendor_description: This affectionate emoji on Apple devices depicts a tender kiss shared between two individuals, featuring a medium-light skin tone for one person and a rich, dark skin tone for the other, rendered with Apple's characteristic glossy 3D shading. Their faces are softly curved, and the gentle blush on their cheeks, enhanced by realistic lighting, conveys warmth and intimacy.  The smooth gradients and rounded edges of their features, a hallmark of Apple's design, make this emoji a heartfelt expression of love, romance, or a fond farewell in messages sent on Apple devices.
